title: "I Live In Hope": A Channel Nightmare Survivor's Search For Missing Father
content: Osama Ahmed's life took a dramatic turn one night in October when the small boat that was to carry him and his father to the English coast sank shortly after setting out from France.
summary: Osama Ahmed's life took a dramatic turn one night in October when the small boat that was to carry him and his father to the English coast sank shortly after setting out from France.

title: Adani-JKH Terminal At Colombo Port Likely To Be Operational From Q1 2025
content: The first cargo ship is likely to reach Sri Lanka's Adani-John Keells Holding (JKH) West Container Terminal (WCT) in Colombo Port in the first quarter of 2025, Srilankan news website The Morning Online reported.
summary: The first cargo ship is likely to reach Sri Lanka's Adani-John Keells Holding (JKH) West Container Terminal (WCT) in Colombo Port in the first quarter of 2025, Srilankan news website The Morning Online reported.

title: 1,500 Russian Troops Killed Or Injured Every Day In October In Ukraine: UK
content: Russian troops recently suffered their worst month for casualties since the country's war with Ukraine began almost three years ago, the head of Britain's armed forces said on Sunday.

title: Violence Outside Sheikh Hasina Party Office After Rally Call, Dhaka Tense
content: Bangladesh's capital Dhaka remains tense on Sunday as several Awami League supporters were reportedly beaten following the party's decision to hold a protest march at Shaheed Noor Hossain Square in commemoration of Noor Hossain Day.
summary: Bangladesh's capital Dhaka remains tense on Sunday as several Awami League supporters were reportedly beaten following the party's decision to hold a protest march at Shaheed Noor Hossain Square in commemoration of Noor Hossain Day.

title: Trump's China Policies To Benefit India, Asian Countries: Ratings Agency
content: With Donald Trump set to become the next US president after the recently closely contested presidential polls, India and other Asian countries are expected to benefit due to rising US-China tensions and potential investment restrictions.

title: Canada Cops Arrest Banned Group's Member Over Hindu Temple Attack

title: In A First, Taliban Officials To Attend UN Climate Conference: Report
content: Afghan Taliban officials will attend a major United Nations climate conference that starts next week, the Afghan Foreign Ministry said on Sunday, the first time they have attended since the former insurgents took power in 2021.

title: Opinion: Trump: To Be His Friend Or Watch From Sidelines?
